ygData.subject: Re: Greetings and a question
ygData.msgSnippet: They fixed the song late in Beta.  Is it worth the price? Well that can be debated. Kolin ... From: John Robertson  To: eqbards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
They fixed the song late in Beta. Is it worth the price? Well that can be
debated.

Kolin
-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 19, 1999 11:04 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Greetings and a question


>From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
>Hello all, I am Jyzan of Karana. I have been playing a bard since beta,
>and I am the author of the bard guide on EQ Vault, under my beta name
>Jyzanthemum. (I changed my name for final because nobody liked typing
>Jyzanthemum) If anyone has any questions, I'd be happy to help if I
>know the answer.
>
>One question I have: does anyone know if the level 18 song, Denon's
>Disruptive Discord actually works yet? It did not in beta.
>
>John
>
